activities: Contact At Once! LLC provides a software-as-a-service solution that enables our customers to add live chat capabilities to their websites.  Visitors to the websites on which our service is deployed may initiate a chat conversation with representatives of our customers.  As a service provider, we are not a party to the chat conversations, but our software does capture personal information when it is provided by a website visitor within the a chat conversation facilitated by our software.  We do not use or disclose the personal information except that, for a given chat conversation, it is made available to the specific customer who was  a party to that chat conversation.  We contractually require our customers to display a privacy policy for the website on which our software is deployed that discloses how they use personal information collected through their use of our software on their website.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
